item.title: Videographers needed for Vancouver Film School shoot - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for 2 videographers to join our team for a 1-2 day shoot at Vancouver Film School. The shoot will involve capturing the essence of the school, including its exterior, interior, and logos. We need experienced videographers familiar with interviews, where lighting and audio are crucial. These interviews will require a 2-camera setup with wireless microphones. Additionally, we need someone skilled in taking product beauty shots of equipment displayed on site. This is a great opportunity to showcase your skills and add impressive content to your portfolio.

Skills required:
- Videography
- Cinematography
- Camera operation
- Lighting
- Attention to detail

Summary of the requirements:
- Capture high-quality 4K images at 25p.
- Proficiency in setting up and managing a 2-camera setup for interviews.
- Experience with wireless microphone systems to ensure clear audio capture.
- Ability to take professional product beauty shots of various equipment.
- Familiarity with capturing the essence and environment of educational institutions is a plus.

Details:
Location: Vancouver Film School
Duration: 1-2 full days (WC 12th of August)
Call Time: 9 AM for setup through 5 PM (latest) for wrap
Lunch Provided
Crew: 2-person team

Post-production:
Handled separately; this job is just the shoot.

Example Production:
https://youtu.be/atzr4QqFfJ0?si=bUIB1y8BCRulkp9L
https://youtu.be/nPLQLr9M5nA?si=O3Xuzfrv170XWKI9

Application:
Please provide a portfolio of previous work, specifically highlighting interviews, educational environments, and product beauty shots.

Thank you!

Budget: $2,500
Posted On: June 18, 2024 12:21 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Video Production, Video Editing, Camera
Skills: Videography, Video Production, Video Editing, Camera
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Longform Youtube Aviation Incident Stories Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced editor to edit longform Youtube aviation incident stories. As an editor, you will be responsible for ensuring the narratives flow smoothly and engagingly, while also applying retention tactics specific to Youtube. This job requires a deep understanding of longform narrative work, as well as expertise in optimizing content for Youtube. If you have a passion for aviation and storytelling, along with the technical skills to captivate audiences on Youtube, we would love to hear from you.

Skills needed:
- Longform narrative editing
- Youtube retention tactics
- Attention to detail
- Strong storytelling abilities
- Adding engaging music and sound effects where needed
- A solid concept of Hook, Build and Payoff structure.

I anticipate each video to be between 18 to 30 minutes long. I prefer a per-project pricing as opposed to an hourly rate.

If interested, please respond with your editing portfolio, preferably in the aviation niche, or else, in the general documentary niche.

Here are sample channels for your reference:
www.youtube.com/@_WyngX
www.youtube.com/@GreenDotAviation



Budget: $500
Posted On: June 18, 2024 12:14 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:English, Writing, Creative Writing
Skills: English, Writing, Creative Writing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Youtube Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for intermediate/experienced video editors to join my media company. You will work with a great team. This contract includes multiple Youtube channels to work on.

Before reading further:
- NO TEAMS
- You are REQUIRED to have a relevant portfolio

Requirements:
- Good communication in English
- Available / Short response-time
- Ability to meet deadlines / fast turnaround time
- Prior experience with Youtube Cash Cow channels / Youtube Automation
- Basic/Good understanding of viewer retention
- Be familiar with 'Trello'

What do you get?
- Good management
- Great team
- Long-term recurring work
- Promotion to Channel Manager / Video Editor Manager
- Performance bonuses over time

Rate per video range betwnee $10 to $30 per video.
Videos have a wide range in length, so the pay will be based upon length + how advanced the edit will be.



Budget: $400

Category: Video Editing
Skills:Footage-Based Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects

item.title: Video Editor / Content Creator for Holistic Wellness Services Advertising - Upwork
item.description:
Description:

We are an incredibly unique and creative holistic wellness center and cafe in Dubai, and are seeking a talented and creative individual to create high performing videos for advertising, as well as apply graphic design skills for our social media posts and print materials.
All branding guidelines such as logos, colours & font styles etc. will be given, and the candidate will demonstrate exceptional attention to detail to match these guidelines with any creative materials.

The ideal candidate will have strong skills in both video editing & graphic design , with a comprehensive understanding of brand guidelines to ensure a cohesive visual expression across all platforms. Additionally, the ability to leverage AI tools for enhanced productivity and creativity is essential.


Responsibilities:

Edit videos from footage captured on mobile devices to create polished, professional content to effectively advertise and sell Holistic Wellness Services online with a high ROI.
Design engaging social media graphics and print materials following the brand guidelines.
Use various editing tools, including AI-powered software, to create ad creatives, social media posts, typography, and photo retouching.
Streamline the visual expression of the brand across different media using AI tools to enhance efficiency and creativity.
Collaborate with the marketing team to understand project requirements and deliver creative solutions.
Ensure all content aligns with the brand's voice and aesthetic.
Stay updated with the latest AI trends and integrate them into design and video editing processes.


Requirements:

- Proven experience in video editing focused on selling services
- Proven experience in graphic design applied to both online and printed content.
- Proficiency in design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, Premiere Pro, After Effects, etc.), and familiarity with AI tools and software.
- Strong command of the English language; bilingual abilities in Arabic are highly preferred.
- Excellent understanding of typography, color theory, and layout design.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
- Attention to detail and a strong sense of aesthetics.
- Portfolio showcasing previous work in graphic design and video editing, including examples of AI-enhanced projects.


Preferred Qualifications:

- Experience working with social media platforms (Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.).
- Understanding of current design trends and best practices.
- Ability to adapt to feedback and refine designs accordingly.
- Knowledge of AI applications in design and video editing for increased productivity and innovation.


How to Apply:

If you are a creative individual with a passion for video editing and design, and the ability to harness the power of AI, we would love to hear from you! Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter explaining why you are the perfect fit for this role.


Posted On: June 18, 2024 11:59 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:AI-Generated Art, Email & Newsletter, Typography, AI-Generated Image, Education, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Social Media Imagery, Adobe Photoshop, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing, Social Media Marketing, Videography, Video Production, Video Ad, Video Advertising
Skills: AI-Generated Art, Email & Newsletter, Typography, AI-Generated Image, Education, Graphic Design, Video Editing, Social Media Imagery, Adobe Photoshop, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing, Social Media Marketing, Videography, Video Production, Video Ad, Video Advertising
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for YouTube Automation Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there!

We are a YouTube automation company looking for an experienced video editor in the geopolitics/macroeconomic niche to help us take our channel to the next level!

We are looking for someone who understands our audience and can raise our AVD to above 50%, and we are looking for MULTIPLE people experienced in editing videos for:

The geopolitics/macroeconomics niche, similar channels to these:
Vox: https://www.youtube.com/@Vox
Economics Explained: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZ4AMrDcNrfy3X6nsU8-rPg
Econ: https://www.youtube.com/@econYT
Invisible Hand: https://www.youtube.com/@TheInvisibleHandCo
Context Matters: https://www.youtube.com/@context.matters

We want to publish one 10 - 14-minute video once a week, and it would be amazing if you could help us with that.

Requirements:
- Good communication skills
- Fast response & turnaround time
- Being able to find source material  references

We have a paid subscription at Storyblocks for you to use.

The payments will be RAISED once we are monetized and profitable.

Please do not apply if you don't have experience in video editing for these types of channels.

If this sounds like a project you’d like to get involved in, then please
get in touch with me ASAP!

Looking forward to working with you!
Mari

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 18, 2024 11:59 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Intro & Outro, YouTube Video, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing, Motion Graphics, Final Cut Pro, YouTube Development
Skills: Video Intro & Outro, YouTube Video, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Explainer Video, Video Post-Editing, Motion Graphics, Final Cut Pro, YouTube Development
Country: Norway
click to apply

item.title: Looking for a GERMAN Translator! - Upwork
item.description:
Hi!

PLEASE ONLY APPLY IF YOU ARE FLUENT IN ENGLISH & GERMAN LANGUAGES.

We need someone that can copy-paste translate our YouTube scripts + translate the titles to 3 of our YouTube channels for each video, and generate new audio files with Elevenlabs!

We need someone that has a basic to advance skill in video editing.

You need to make sure that the titles sounds good and native in the languages you translate to so they can perform well! The translated audio files also need to sound good so people in other languages can enjoy them 🙌

We are using YouTubes new feature and want to expand to multiple languages to get bigger reach

There will be about 15-20 titles & scripts per week that needs to be translated into all of these 4 languages

You will be using Google translate or ChatGPT for translation and
Elevenlabs to generate the audio files, we also need you to cut up the files so they match the video length!

IMPORTANT:
It's great if you can use audio or editing programs to adjust the length of the generations of AI text to speech. It needs to match the length of the videos on YouTube to be compatible!

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 18, 2024 11:48 UTC
Category: Manual Transcription
Skills:English, German, Translation, Video Editing
Skills: English, German, Translation, Video Editing
Country: Sweden
click to apply

item.title: Professional Audio Editor for Short Films and Wedding Films - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a professional audio editor with experience in working on short films and wedding films. The ideal candidate will have a keen ear for detail and the ability to enhance the overall audio quality of our projects. This role will involve tasks such as audio cleaning, dialogue editing, sound design, and mixing. The successful candidate should be proficient in using industry-standard audio editing software and possess a strong understanding of audio post-production techniques.

Pay will range for each job
$50 for 30 second commercial
$75 for 1 minute
$200 for 5 minutes

    Required Skills:
    - Proficiency in audio editing software (e.g., Adobe Audition, Pro Tools)
    - Strong understanding of audio post-production techniques
    - Ability to clean and enhance audio quality
    - Dialogue editing and sound design skills
    - Mixing and mastering expertise

  If you are passionate about creating high-quality audio for short films and wedding films, we would love to hear from you. This is a fantastic opportunity to work on projects that showcase your skills and contribute to visually stunning films.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 18, 2024 11:43 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Audio Editing, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Tutorial Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to work on a tutorial video. The video is approximately 6-8 minutes long and requires several edits to ensure a polished final product.

Responsibilities:

Add intro and outro animations.
Perform color correction.
Ensure consistent audio quality throughout the video (recorded on multiple days).
Edit out long pauses and transitions between different parts of the video.
Blur out any content that should not be visible to the viewers.
Correct small mistakes to ensure a seamless viewing experience.

Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
Attention to detail and ability to deliver high-quality work.
Good communication skills to discuss and understand project requirements.

Project Details:

Type: Tutorial video
Length: 6-8 minutes
Deadline: Asap

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 18, 2024 11:46 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Belgium
click to apply

Ensure consistent audio quality throughout the video (recorded on multiple days).
Edit out long pauses and transitions between different parts of the video.
Blur out any content that should not be visible to the viewers.
Correct small mistakes to ensure a seamless viewing experience.

Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.).
Attention to detail and ability to deliver high-quality work.
Good communication skills to discuss and understand project requirements.

Project Details:

Type: Tutorial video
Length: 6-8 minutes
Deadline: Asap

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 18, 2024 11:46 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Belgium

item.title: Looking for a FRENCH Translator! - Upwork
item.description:
Hi!

PLEASE ONLY APPLY IF YOU ARE FLUENT IN ENGLISH & FRENCH LANGUAGES.

We need someone that can copy-paste translate our YouTube scripts + translate the titles to 3 of our YouTube channels for each video, and generate new audio files with Elevenlabs!

We need someone that has a basic to advance skill in video editing.

You need to make sure that the titles sounds good and native in the languages you translate to so they can perform well! The translated audio files also need to sound good so people in other languages can enjoy them 🙌

We are using YouTubes new feature and want to expand to multiple languages to get bigger reach

There will be about 15-20 titles & scripts per week that needs to be translated into all of these 4 languages

You will be using Google translate or ChatGPT for translation and
Elevenlabs to generate the audio files, we also need you to cut up the files so they match the video length!

IMPORTANT:
It's great if you can use audio or editing programs to adjust the length of the generations of AI text to speech. It needs to match the length of the videos on YouTube to be compatible!

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 18, 2024 11:42 UTC
Category: Manual Transcription
Skills:English, French, Translation, Video Editing
Skills: English, French, Translation, Video Editing
Country: Sweden

item.title: Reels/Shorts Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create reels/shorts from a long-form video. The ideal candidate must be fluent in English and have a keen eye for adding tasteful graphics. As a video editor, you will be responsible for cutting, trimming, and rearranging footage to create engaging reels and shorts. You should have a strong sense of storytelling and be able to work with minimal supervision. Attention to detail and the ability to work within tight deadlines are crucial.

Need to create 4-5 good quality reel/shorts from 1 hour video

  Skills required:
  - Video editing
  - Fluent English
  - Graphic design
  - Storytelling
  - Attention to detail

  If you have a passion for creating visually captivating content and can transform long-form videos into compelling reels and shorts, we would love to hear from you.

  Please provide a portfolio or previous work samples showcasing your video editing skills.

  Note: This is a remote position and can be done from anywhere in the world.

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 18, 2024 11:31 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: Australia

item.title: Talented Freelance Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are a fast-growing digital marketing agency in need of a talented freelance video creator to join our team. As a video creator, you will be responsible for producing high-quality videos for our clients that align with their brand and marketing objectives. Your role will involve ideation, scriptwriting, filming, editing, and post-production. The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio demonstrating their skills in video creation and storytelling.

   Responsibilities:
   - Collaborate with the marketing team to understand client requirements
   - Develop creative concepts and storyboards
   - Shoot and edit footage to create engaging videos
   - Ensure videos adhere to brand guidelines and meet client expectations
   - Stay updated with industry trends and techniques

   Skills:
   - Video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
   - Cinematography and lighting techniques
   - Storytelling and scriptwriting
   - Strong attention to detail
   - Excellent communication and collaboration skills

   This is a medium-sized project with a duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level video creator who has prior experience working with digital marketing agencies and producing videos for various platforms (social media, websites, advertisements). If you are passionate about creating compelling video content and can work efficiently within deadlines, we would love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 11:20 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Videography
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Videography
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply
